did.abstract: Letters to Dix from his brother, Roger Sherman Dix, describing the battle of Buena Vista. Letters written by John Adams Dix include an account of the activities of General Jacob Brown, commander of the Northern Division of the United States Army, 1820, and a letter from the period when Dix was secretary of state in New York.
